data.name: Founding Day of the Taiwan
data.description:
According to regulations, one day off.
January 1st falls on Sunday, and one day off is made up on January 2nd (Monday).

data.description: January 20th (Friday) is adjusted to a day off, and work is made up on January 7th (Saturday), but there is no trading or delivery.

data.name: Lunar New Year's Eve

data.name: Lunar New Year
data.description:
According to regulations, a three-day holiday from January 22nd to January 24th.

January 21st and 22nd fall on Saturday and Sunday, and two days off are made up on January 25th (Wednesday) and January 26th (Thursday).
January 27th (Friday) is adjusted to a day off, and work is made up on February 4th (Saturday), but there is no trading or delivery.
